data.decision: Duro business model: Bottoms-up B2B - personal tool for developers, sell team licenses to companies
data.rationale: Developer adopts personally, loves it, brings to work, company pays. Proven model (Slack, Notion, Figma). Lower CAC than enterprise sales, builds organic advocacy. Realistic path to $50-100K ARR Year 1 while bootstrapping.
alternatives: Pure enterprise sales (requires funding, long cycles)
Open source only with services (harder to monetize)
